title: How to buy a phone in Dubai from India - Quora

response.answer_text: You could shop online. Souq . Com Sharaf DG is another retailer Jumbo electronics There are may electronic giants, you could shop on their website pay with your card. If you want it as a gift have them delivered to the recipients address. If you want it for you find a person who is traveling to India from Dubai and have the deliver it to you.

No you can’t. I suggest you don’t. iPhones meant for Dubai are different from rest of the world. Arabic is a must on the label for any product that you sell in Dubai. Also no taxes as of now but soon to come in 2018. The iPhone for Dubai comes without FaceTime
